name: RillaFi
description: Rillafi is bringing real world financial tools to web 3. RillaFi is radically innovating philanthropic giving and tax strategy by leveraging the power of decentralized finance, blockchain technology, and decentralization. By leveraging our on-chain tools, users can optimize their philanthropic giving and tax strategy while supporting causes they care about most. The $RILLA token unites the protocol and ecosystem while providing real-world utility to our users. Our mission is to decentralize, amplify, and accelerate charitable giving. Any asset, any chain, any time.
